org.apache.paimon.operation

Interface BundleFileStoreWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FileStoreWrite<InternalRow>, Restorable<List<FileStoreWrite.State<InternalRow>>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppendOnlyFileStoreWrite

    public interface BundleFileStoreWriter
extends FileStoreWrite<InternalRow>
    Whether the writer could write bundle.

    • Method Detail

      • writeBundle

        void writeBundle(BinaryRow partition,
                 int bucket,
                 BundleRecords bundle)
          throws Exception
        Write the batch data to the store according to the partition and bucket.
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition of the data
        bucket - the bucket id of the data
        bundle - the given data
        Throws:
        Exception - the thrown exception when writing the record
